basics.name: Dennis Ezell
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Proactive software developer with experience in full stack development and maintenance of complex and business critical systems. Currently working within a Microsoft technology stack with previous experience in a Java/Oracle stack.

work.company: CentralSquare Technologies (Merged Aptean public sector with Superion, Tritech, and Zuercher)
work.summary: Jurisdiction Online - Project rollout lead team member
highlights: Self-directed, Full stack Microsoft based development using ASP.NET combined with SQL Server
Lead member of project rollout team responsible for bringing new clients into the Jurisdiction Online system
Work with solution architects to provide overall project technical direction
Mentor new and less experienced developers
Serve as the lead project developer

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
